Package com.neu.prattle.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl
    public interface UserService
    Acts as an interface between the data layer and the servlet controller. The controller is responsible for interfacing with this instance to perform all the CRUD operations on user accounts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addUser​(User user)
      Tries to add a user in the system
      void deleteUser​(User user)
      Tries to delete a User in the system
      java.util.Optional<User> findUserByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns an optional object which might be empty or wraps an object if the System contains a User object having the same name as the parameter.
      java.util.Optional<User> findUserByNameWithGroups​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns an optional object that contains a User with related group objects.
      java.util.List<User> getAllUsersOnline​(int maxResults)
      Retrieves all users from database that have an "online" status flag.

      Gets the status of a user
      boolean isTest()
      Returns value indicating whether UserService is configured for testing

    • Method Detail

      • findUserByName

        java.util.Optional<User> findUserByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns an optional object which might be empty or wraps an object if the System contains a User object having the same name as the parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the user
        Returns:
        Optional object.

      • findUserByNameWithGroups

        java.util.Optional<User> findUserByNameWithGroups​(java.lang.String name)
        Returns an optional object that contains a User with related group objects. Only use if need access to groups.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the user.
        Returns:
        Optional object.
